title: Remove empty property lists in `dependencies`
description: A `dependencies` entry with an empty array never changes validation; it is redundant.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Wrong: Tautological empty dependency list
comprehensiveExamples.description: A dependency array with no properties is a no-op.

comprehensiveExamples.title: Right: Non-empty dependency list
comprehensiveExamples.description: Declaring actual dependent properties is valid.
